Package intialClasses

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CM
    An ActionListener used for the purpose of closing a specific menu on ActionEvent.
    DClick2
    A MouseListener that enables a given TextFiels on a MouseEvent.
    Dia
    A specialized Dialog used to display a certain message.
    Grader
    An concise method to run through a directory of student responses to a given test, whose answers are stored in a given .test file.
    MClick
    A MouseListener that enables or disables a group of TextArea objects, depending on its mode.
    MClick2
    A MouseListener that performs different operations on a TextField.
    OpenTG
    A specialized ActionListener used to open a TGMenu upon an ActionEvent.
    PGMenu
    The Python Grader menu.
    Question
    A representation a multiple choice question that has a prompt and answer choices.
    Start
    Launches ANONA Tech's Test Generator and Grader User Interface.
    Test
    A method to associate a specific permutation of a set of questions with a unique ID.
    TestWriter
    This class provides an encapsulated method for generating .txt files that contain a unique permutation of a test to be shown to students.
    TGeMenu
    The menu for grading tests.
    TGMenu
    The menu for generating test.
    TopMenu
    The menu used to navigate to the three different portions of AONA Tech's Test Generator and Grader, the Generator UI, the Grader UI, and the Python Grader UI
    ValueGetter
    A specialized Dialog that obtains a value from the user.
    WrittenQuestion
    Represents a written response question that is part of a test.
